18 import rospy
19 from threading import Thread
20 import rosnode
21 
22 from niryo_robot_system_api_client import system_api_client
23 
24 from ..common.rpi_ros_utils import send_shutdown_command, activate_learning_mode
25 from ..common.rpi_ros_utils import LedState, send_led_state
26 from ..common.abstract_top_button import AbstractTopButton
27 
28 # Command Status
29 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus
30 
31 # Messages
32 from std_msgs.msg import Int32, Bool, Int8
33 from niryo_robot_arm_commander.msg import PausePlanExecution
34 from niryo_robot_programs_manager.msg import ProgramIsRunning
35 
36 # Services
37 from niryo_robot_rpi.srv import LedBlinker, LedBlinkerRequest
38 
39 
40 class ButtonMode:
41 
42  def __init__(self):
43  pass
44 
45  DO_NOTHING = 0
46  TRIGGER_SEQUENCE_AUTORUN = 1
47  BLOCKLY_SAVE_POINT = 2
48 
49 
50 class TopButton(AbstractTopButton):
51 
52  def __init__(self):
53  self.pause_time = None
54  self.resume = None
55 
56  self.__program_manager_is_running = False
57 
58  self.button_mode = ButtonMode.TRIGGER_SEQUENCE_AUTORUN
59  self.last_time_button_mode_changed = rospy.Time.now()
60 
61  self.__led_state = LedState.OK
62  self.__set_led_state_service = rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot_rpi/set_led_custom_blinker', LedBlinker)
63 
64  # - Publishers
65  # Publisher used to send info to Niryo Studio, so the user can add a move block
66  # by pressing the button
67  self.save_point_publisher = rospy.Publisher("/niryo_robot/blockly/save_current_point", Int32, queue_size=10)
68  self._button_state_publisher = rospy.Publisher("/niryo_robot/rpi/is_button_pressed",
69  Bool,
70  latch=True,
71  queue_size=1)
72 
73  super(TopButton, self).__init__()
74 
75  # - Subscribers
76  # This code doesn't work anymore, but because of a lack of time and because the Ned isn't supposed
77  # to be maintained, I will let this like this
78  rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_programs_manager/program_is_running',
79  ProgramIsRunning,
80  self.__callback_program_is_running)
81  rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot/rpi/led_state', Int8, self.__callback_led_state)
82 
83  # Seems to be overkill over that value due to reading IO time
84  self.__button_loop_frequency = rospy.Rate(10)
85  self.__button_loop_thread = Thread(target=self.check_button_loop)
86  self.__button_loop_thread.start()
87 
88  rospy.loginfo("Niryo Button started")
89 
90  def read_value(self):
91  super(TopButton, self).read_value()
92  self._button_state_publisher.publish(self.is_button_pressed())
93  return self._button_state
94 
95  def __callback_program_is_running(self, msg):
96  if self.__program_manager_is_running and not msg.program_is_running:
97  self.__program_manager_is_running = msg.program_is_running
98  self.__is_prog_running()
99  else:
100  self.__program_manager_is_running = msg.program_is_running
101 
102  def __callback_led_state(self, msg):
103  self.__led_state = msg.data
104 
105  def __trigger_blockly_save_point(self):
106  self.blockly_save_current_point()
107 
108  def check_button_loop(self):
109  self.__button_loop_frequency.sleep()
110  last_press_time = rospy.Time.now()
111  elapsed_seconds = 15
112 
113  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
114  button_was_pressed = self.is_button_pressed()
115 
116  self.read_value()
117  if self.is_button_pressed():
118  if not button_was_pressed:
119  last_press_time = rospy.Time.now()
120  elapsed_seconds = (rospy.Time.now() - last_press_time).to_sec()
121  self.led_advertiser(elapsed_seconds)
122 
123  # Was pressed and is not anymore (release)
124  elif button_was_pressed:
125  # Check if there is an action to do
126  if elapsed_seconds >= 10:
127  pass
128  elif elapsed_seconds >= 6:
129  system_api_client.start_hotspot()
130  elif elapsed_seconds >= 3:
131  send_shutdown_command()
132  elif 0.02 < elapsed_seconds < 3:
133  # Detect if a prog is running
134  python_prog_is_running = self.__is_prog_running()
135  # If a programm is running
136  if python_prog_is_running:
137  self.__manage_python_program()
138  elif self.button_mode == ButtonMode.BLOCKLY_SAVE_POINT:
139  self.__trigger_blockly_save_point()
140  elif self.button_mode == ButtonMode.TRIGGER_SEQUENCE_AUTORUN:
141  self._trigger_sequence_autorun()
142 
143  self.__button_loop_frequency.sleep()
144 
145  def __manage_python_program(self):
146  # Pause the current move
147  if self._pause_state in [PausePlanExecution.PLAY]:
148  rospy.loginfo("Button Manager - Sequence paused")
149  self.pause_time = rospy.Time.now()
150  self._send_pause_state(PausePlanExecution.PAUSE)
151  # Pause led advertiser
152  self.__set_led_state_service(True, 5, LedBlinkerRequest.LED_WHITE, PausePlanExecution.PAUSE_TIMEOUT)
153  # Double press on pause: activate learning mode
154  elif self._pause_state == PausePlanExecution.PAUSE and (rospy.Time.now() - self.pause_time).to_sec() < 1:
155  activate_learning_mode(True)
156  self.__set_led_state_service(True, 5, LedBlinkerRequest.LED_WHITE, 0)
157  rospy.loginfo("Button Manager - Sequence paused with learning mode")
158  # Program paused: resume or cancel
159  elif self._pause_state == PausePlanExecution.PAUSE:
160  # wait if double clic occurs
161  if self.double_press():
162  rospy.logwarn("Button Manager - Cancel sequence")
163  self.__stop_blinker()
164  activate_learning_mode(True)
165  self._send_pause_state(PausePlanExecution.CANCEL)
166  if self.__program_manager_is_running:
167  self._cancel_program_from_program_manager()
168 
169  self.read_value()
170  while not rospy.is_shutdown() and self.is_button_pressed():
171  self.__button_loop_frequency.sleep()
172  self.read_value()
173  else:
174  rospy.loginfo("Button Manager - Resume sequence")
175  self.__stop_blinker()
176  activate_learning_mode(False)
177  rospy.sleep(0.2)
178  self._send_pause_state(PausePlanExecution.RESUME)
179  self._pause_state = PausePlanExecution.PLAY
180 
181  def double_press(self):
182  start_time = rospy.Time.now()
183  self.read_value()
184  button_pressed = self.is_button_pressed()
185  while not rospy.is_shutdown() and (rospy.Time.now() - start_time).to_sec() < 1:
186  self.read_value()
187  if not button_pressed and self.is_button_pressed():
188  return True
189  button_pressed = self.is_button_pressed()
190  self.__button_loop_frequency.sleep()
191  return False
192 
193  def __is_prog_running(self):
194  if self.__program_manager_is_running:
195  python_prog_is_running = True
196  else:
197  python_prog_running_nodes = [s for s in rosnode.get_node_names() if "ros_wrapper" in s]
198  python_prog_is_running = bool(python_prog_running_nodes)
199 
200  # Deal with new state
201  if not python_prog_is_running:
202  # if the state is paused, it means that the pause timeout has appeared.
203  # Otherwise it's a program that has ended.
204  if self._pause_state == PausePlanExecution.PAUSE:
205  activate_learning_mode(True)
206  self._send_pause_state(PausePlanExecution.STANDBY)
207  self.__stop_blinker()
208 
209  elif self._pause_state not in [PausePlanExecution.PLAY, PausePlanExecution.PAUSE]:
210  # detect a new execution of a program
211  self._send_pause_state(PausePlanExecution.PLAY)
212  self.__stop_blinker()
213 
214  return python_prog_is_running
215 
216  def __stop_blinker(self):
217  self.__set_led_state_service(False, 0, 0, 0)
218 
219  def led_advertiser(self, elapsed_seconds):
220  # Use LED to help user know which action to execute
221  if elapsed_seconds >= 10:
222  if LedState.OK != self.__led_state:
223  self.__led_state = LedState.OK
224  send_led_state(LedState.OK)
225  elif elapsed_seconds >= 6:
226  if LedState.WAIT_HOTSPOT != self.__led_state:
227  self.__led_state = LedState.WAIT_HOTSPOT
228  send_led_state(LedState.WAIT_HOTSPOT)
229  elif elapsed_seconds >= 3:
230  if LedState.SHUTDOWN != self.__led_state:
231  self.__led_state = LedState.SHUTDOWN
232  send_led_state(LedState.SHUTDOWN)
233 
234  def blockly_save_current_point(self):
235  msg = Int32()
236  msg.data = 1
237  self.save_point_publisher.publish(msg)
238 
239  def callback_change_button_mode(self, req):
240  # message = ""
241  if req.value == ButtonMode.TRIGGER_SEQUENCE_AUTORUN:
242  message = "Successfully changed button mode to trigger sequence autorun"
243  elif req.value == ButtonMode.BLOCKLY_SAVE_POINT:
244  message = "Successfully changed button mode to save point"
245  elif req.value == ButtonMode.DO_NOTHING:
246  message = "Successfully changed button mode to disabled"
247  else:
248  return {"status": CommandStatus.BUTTON_ERROR, "message": "Incorrect button mode."}
249  self.button_mode = req.value
250  self.last_time_button_mode_changed = rospy.Time.now()
251  return {"status": CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "message": message}
